parameters.name: NumOfComponent
parameters.description: Number of components in the Component array

title: IInterferenceDetectionMgr.GetComponentsTransformInterferenceCount
description: Calculates and gets the number of interfering components for the specified components and math transform.
signature:
System.Int32 GetComponentsTransformInterferenceCount( 
   System.Int32
NumOfComponent
,
   ref Component2
Component
,
   ref MathTransform
Transform
)

parameters.name: NumOfComponent
parameters.description: Number of components in the Component array

remarks:
Call this method before calling
IInterferenceDetectionMgr::IGetComponentsTransformInterference
to get the size of the array returned by that method.
